
{{alias}}( str[, p] )
    Converts a string to sticky case.

    Parameters
    ----------
    str: string
        Input string.
 
    p: number
        Probability of capitalization.

    Returns
    -------
    out: string
        Sticky-cased string.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( 'Hello World!' )


    > var out = {{alias}}( 'I am a tiny little teapot' )

    See Also
    --------
